name: Misato Katsuragi's Reporting Plan
description:
A new form of news coverage by Misato Katsuragi.

The popular character "Misato Katsuragi" from "Evangelion" is reproduced in high quality 3DCG.
A new era of news services that combines the best speech synthesis technology is born here!
We will tell you the latest news acquired in real time.

  • You need to purchase a news license separately to enjoy this software.
